channel.title: Tangomusic on DJ Lorenzo
channel.description: Recent content in Tangomusic on DJ Lorenzo

item.title: DJ Seminar
item.description: DJ Seminar for anyone who wants to become a tango DJ or wants some input to improve as a tango DJ. Bridgehuset @ 15:00 2014-03-01 Recommended listening: Classics of Argentine Tango Classics of Argentine Tango @ Spotify Recommended reading: Playing Music for the Milonga: The DJs role TangoDJ discussion group Other things mentioned during the seminar: Database useful for tagging music collection: tango.

item.title: Classics of Tango Dance Music on Spotify
item.description: To help beginners and other interested in getting acquainted with the classics of tango music, I started putting together Spotify playlists from Stephen Brown’s excellent list Classics of Tango Dance Music. This is a work in progress, and it is not all in there. These playlists are all collaborative playlists, and any help is very much appreciated. I got a few Spotify invites to spare, let me know if you need one.

item.title: What I played
item.description: I’m considering publishing playlists in a suitable format. By now, you can get an overview of what I played before on my last.fm page. Top ten on the list above.
